p: Hugh L White personally appeared before me Peter W. Johnstone a Justice of the Peace within and for said County and being duly Sworn says that on or about the 20th day of October 1856 I found a Negro mans called Eleck Loan Secreted on the Steamboat Emigrant, which I believe to be a Runaway Slave and pray the Justice to comand to the common Jail of Saint Louis Co said negro as a Runaway Slave
Sworn to and subscribed before me this 25h day of October 1856
Peter W Johnstone Justice of the Peace
